snippet: M T Carney, an outsider hired to direct marketing for Walt Disney Studios, has never overcome her industry inexperience, and the company is now said to be seeking her replacement.
abstract: M T Carney, Walt Disney Studios' new president of movie marketing, has never overcome her industry inexperience and company is now said to be seeking her replacement; her departure may say more about the insularity of the movie industry and its resistance to innovation than her marketing talents, which by many accounts are considerable.
lead_paragraph: M T Carney, an outsider hired to direct marketing for Walt Disney Studios, has never overcome her industry inexperience, and the company is now said to be seeking her replacement.

headline.seo: The Downfall of a Disney Marketing Executive
headline.main: In Hollywood’s Clubby Culture, a Disney Marketer’s Rapid Downfall
